ai-ya5.3.4:1.1_0: They give up what leads to suffering, and not for them?
ai-ya5.3.4:2.1_0: Or to give up what ceases, you understand suffering?
ai-ya5.3.4:3.1_0: It’s really true that leads to suffering?
ai-ya5.3.4:4.1_0: It’s true that leads to suffering, but not its origin.
ai-ya5.3.4:4.1_1: The truth and the origin of the world—with its cessation, and the practice that leads to its cessation—not quarrels, not the truth of the nature.
ai-ya5.3.4:5.1_0: Or to which suffering doesn’t come to be.
ai-ya5.3.4:6.1_0: He knows the best path, but doesn’t completely understand suffering.
ai-ya5.3.4:6.1_1: The origin of the world has faded away and the origin of the world, the ending of suffering, and the truth of Suffering. But they don’t know or see.
